8.29.18  6:25 pm   8.29.18  2:49 am   ive tried doing this, like writing poetry and stuff, but it hasn't worked out any better ...

     i think my problem is lack of a subject. i could write about something stupid and near meaningless and itd be easier but that doesn't really seem fun to me
8.29.18  5:29 pm   what's a word that you thought meant one thing but actually meant something completely different
8.29.18  5:16 pm   bro what is up with all these 15 year olds going to you for help with their messed up mental problems

8.29.18  4:39 pm   what kind of keyboard would you recommend to buy on a very low budget? it's gotta have hammer action, thats the biggest priority. a midi controller is cheaper than a digital piano but it doesnt have 88 keys

      and i dont really know how to use them (i dont know about musical softwares).

      do i need 88 keys (i dont think i can play classical music on a 2 octave keyboard but it might be enough for other styles.

      i havent been playing for almost a year because i dont have the funds for a digital piano so i gotta find something buyable. right now i have this toyish keyboard thing that has no hammer action and when you play chords and melody at the same time it makes weird noises instead of playing what you play.
8.29.18  4:35 pm   When are you going to start dropping crazy hints on insta?

      Websites must have formatted correctly code,

      people need to get married and have kids,

     I need to get this done in 2 weeks,

      the old days were better, etc.)
8.29.18  4:25 pm   i have to educate-entertain thousands of people or in someway contribute to their lives. thats the intent. but the big question is where do i begin?

maybe people don't like jazz harmony

8.29.18  9:03 am   lots of us take a mandated break during the work day but someone else is telling us to do it in fact a lot hahaha of the things mmmmpfhgt you express that you struggle with gulp could be fixed by someone else telling you to do it.

8.29.18  2:03 am   how often do you take breaks in between answering questions and working on videos and music and everything on the site and WOW YOU DO A LOT OF THINGS

ok yeah how often do you take breaks because it feels like my breaks are so long that me being productive is almost like a break from taking a break and i end up feeling really down during extended breaks (actual breaks, not breaks from taking a break) and it makes me not even wanna start doing productive things again because i wanna keep feeling down for some reason because it takes less effort than being productive :(

anyway how often do u take breaks

8.29.18  1:55 am   Have you ever considered singing to a track through the PA when you perform live?

      I've had a lot of success with it. If people are into the music, and you can sell yourself with presence on stage, it really works.

      Or are you very preferable to a live instrumental performance?

8.29.18  1:29 am   What inspired you to do music?
